title: Boy, 10, accidentally shot with handgun
content:
LAWRENCE, KS (KCTV) -
Police say a 10-year-old boy was accidentally shot in the stomach with a handgun Friday night.
Sgt. Trent McKinley with the Lawrence Police Department said it happened shortly after 7 p.m. in a home in the 6200 block of West 22nd Court in southwest Lawrence. The boy was taken to Stormont-Vail HealthCare in Topeka, KS, where he was prepped for surgery. A physician at the hospital indicated that his injuries were not life threatening.
Police say they believe the shooting was accidental.
